title: Axe (Hardrock) - First 4 Albums 1979-1982 @256kbps
description:
Axe (Hardrock) - First 4 Albums 1979-1982 @256kbps

Axe is a Hardrockband from Texas that formed in 1979. Those Albums are quite difficult to find, but worth having them in your Rock Collection.

Line-Up:

Bobby Barth (guitar, lead vocals) 
Edgar Riley (keyboards, backing vocals) 
Michael Osborne (guitar) 
Mike Turpin (bass) 
Teddy Mueller (dr) 

********************************************************

Included in this Torrent are the first 4 Albums @256kbps
